text: Raja Ravi Varma Art gallery is set up by the Kerala Lalithakala Akademi at Kilimanoor, the birthplace of the renowned painter Raja Ravi Varma.It displays nearly 50 paintings of Raja Ravi Varma.It is now permanently closed. ==References== Category:Art museums and galleries in India Category:Arts of Kerala Category:Raja Ravi Varma
title: Raja Ravi Varma Art gallery
